message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,000,000, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's a perfect match. We are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, hoping to make this a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you choose to accept, you'll be unlocking unparalleled benefits and opportunities associated with this product. Let's make this happen! If you need any further information or have questions, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
